code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{useTranslation}from'react-i18next';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";function LanguageSwitcher(){const{i18n,t}=useTranslation();const[currentLanguage,setCurrentLanguage]=useState('en');const handleLanguageChange=()=>{if(currentLanguage==='en'){i18n.changeLanguage('ar');setCurrentLanguage('ar');}else{i18n.changeLanguage('en');setCurrentLanguage('en');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"fixed bottom-0 right-0 mb-4 mr-4",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:"bg-blue-500 hover:bg-blue-700 text-white font-bold py-2 px-4 rounded",onClick:handleLanguageChange,children:currentLanguage==='en'?'العربية':'English'})});}export default LanguageSwitcher;
